newsitem.title: USA: Kansas feedlot cattle sales very thin $63 - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Kansas feedlot cattle sales very thin $63 - USDA.

text.p: Trade was slow, with few sales slaughter steers and heifers fully steady, USDA said.

Inquiry good, demand moderate. Sales confirmed on 300 slaughter steers and 100 slaughter heifers Friday. This week's confirmed sales 90,100 head including 26,700 head or about 30 percent previously contracted or formulated cattle. Sales FOB feedlot net weights after 4 percent shrink.
Slaughter Steers - Few Select and Choice 2-3 1150-1200 lbs 63.00. Slaughter Heifers - Few Select and Choice 2-3 1100 lbs 63.00. Confirmed - 400 Last week - none Last year - none
